bibl.title: Diodor, Ephoros und die Hellenika Oxyrhynchia.
bibl.note: Tracks the double epitomizing process that underpins the relationship between Diodorus' Historical Library and the Hellenica Oxyrhynchia.
bibl.seg: Bruno Bleckman, Diodor, Ephoros und die Hellenika Oxyrhynchia.
Marietta Horster & Christiane Reitz, Condensing Texts - Condensed Texts = Palingenesia. 98 (Stuttgart, 2010) pp. 435-450.
Tracks the double epitomizing process that underpins the relationship between Diodorus' Historical Library and the Hellenica Oxyrhynchia.
